name: dankly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an unpleasantly wet and cold way: It was cold in his dankly curtained office. The water smelled dankly of mud, which I hadn't noticed when I was swimming in it.
More examplesFewer examplesThe shower curtain hung dankly, with large spots of mildew along its bottom edge.The lilies, flowers that symbolized eternal life, were dankly rotting in a vase.The mist spread dankly across the meadows.The story takes place in the dankly crumbling splendour of Venice.
